Title: What We've Been Training For
Description: Are you ready to put your pets to the test? The battle pet arena is no place for low-level rabbits, you'd better have a rocketbot in your pocket and be ready for action. If you've got three fully-experienced pets, find battles against trainers of similar skill and show the world what you've got. You can find the instructions in your Pet Journal.
ObjectivesText: Defeat 10 players through Find Battle with a team of level 25 pets.
